body: Live **NYC Mayoral Election odds**. Who is going to take over from Bill de Blasio to run the greatest city in the world? Well.. As you'll soon see, it's an incredibly volatile market. Andrew Yang looked to have it locked up until the debates started. Yang went from a 77% chance to be the next Mayor, to completely cast. Now it looks like Eric Adams' job to lose. But surely we have to learn from the Yang experience that this market has enough drastic movement in it.
